snippet.title: The Vale: Shadow of the Crown (Blind Accessible Audio Game) -- Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
NOTE: This is a blind accessible audio game with few visuals and spatial sound.  STEREO HEADPHONES ARE REQUIRED for best experience.

The Vale is an audio-based, story driven, action-adventure game. Fight your way through a variety of enemies in real-time combat using different weapons and skills. Collect gold; buy weapons and armor; explore villages; take up quests; hunt animals; and search for lost artifacts in open "dungeon" locations. Immerse yourself in a fully-voiced branching narrative with a colorful cast of characters. 

Now Available on PC and Xbox 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/989790
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/the-vale-shadow-of-the-crown
https://falling-squirrel.itch.io/the-vale
https://www.microsoft.com/en-ca/p/the-vale-shadow-of-the-crown/9n4vkp9f0s68#

https://www.fallingsquirrel.com/the-vale
https://twitter.com/fallingsquirrel
https://www.facebook.com/FallingSquirrel
